00036 // Start of CEGUI namespace section
00037 namespace CEGUI
00038 {
00045 class CEGUIEXPORT TabButton : public ButtonBase
00046 {
00047 public:
00048         static const String EventNamespace;                             
00049     static const String WidgetTypeName;             
00050 
00051         /*************************************************************************
00052                 Event name constants
00053         *************************************************************************/
00054         // generated internally by Window
00055         static const String EventClicked;                                       
00056         static const String EventDragged;                                       
00057         static const String EventScrolled;                                      
00058 
00059         /*************************************************************************
00060                 Construction and Destruction
00061         *************************************************************************/
00066         TabButton(const String& type, const String& name);
00067 
00068 
00073         virtual ~TabButton(void);
00074 
00079     virtual void setSelected(bool selected) { d_selected = selected; requestRedraw(); }
00080 
00085     bool isSelected(void) const { return d_selected; }
00086 
00087 
00093     void setTargetWindow(Window* wnd);
00099     Window* getTargetWindow(void) { return d_targetWindow; }
00100 
00101 protected:
00102     /*************************************************************************
00103     Implementation Data
00104     *************************************************************************/
00105     bool    d_selected;             
00106     bool    d_dragging;             
00107     Window* d_targetWindow;         
00108         /*************************************************************************
00109                 New Event Handlers
00110         *************************************************************************/
00115         virtual void    onClicked(WindowEventArgs& e);
00116 
00117 
00118         /*************************************************************************
00119                 Overridden Event Handlers
00120         *************************************************************************/
00121     virtual void onMouseButtonUp(MouseEventArgs& e);
00122     virtual void onMouseButtonDown(MouseEventArgs& e);
00123     virtual void onMouseWheel(MouseEventArgs& e);
00124     virtual void onMouseMove(MouseEventArgs& e);
00125 
00126         /*************************************************************************
00127                 Implementation Functions
00128         *************************************************************************/
00139         virtual bool    testClassName_impl(const String& class_name) const
00140         {
00141                 if (class_name=="TabButton")    return true;
00142                 return ButtonBase::testClassName_impl(class_name);
00143         }
00144 };
